alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 5:16AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Light Freezing Precipitation May Cause Slick Driving Conditions... An area of freezing precipitation has developed over portions of the northern St Lawrence Valley, as well as Chittenden and Addison counties this morning. Light ice accretion has occurred on elevated surfaces at the Patrick Leahy Burlington International Airport. If road surfaces appear wet this morning, it may actually be a thin glaze of ice. Precautionary/Preparedness Actions... Light freezing precipitation may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution...especially on bridges...overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
